sources.title: Surrender, HELL! (1959) KEITH ANDESüçï SUSAN CABOT
sources.description:
It's FRIDAY @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Keith Andes, Susan Cabot, Paraluman
Director: John Barnwell

At the outset of World War II, US Army Lieutenant Donald D. Blackburn is stationed in the Philippines. When American troops led by Gen. MacArthur are overrun at Bataan, he refuses to surrender. Instead, Blackburn escapes to the hills, where he organizes local rebels and headhunter tribes into a tactile fighting force. Watch for Susan Cabot -- best remembered for her title role in the Wasp Woman.

TRIVIA: based on the true exploits of Donald D. Blackburn, a lieutenant serving in the Philippines at the beginning of the war II, recounted in a book written by Philip Harkins.

metadata.Plot: An officer leads a band of Filipino guerrillas against the Japanese in anticipation of Gen. Douglas MacArthur's return.
metadata.Writer: John Barnwell, Philip Harkins, Charles Martin
